Articles.Content:
Kerbals, what are they?, Funny little green people. They look like they have chlorophyll in their skin.

They are actually accident-prone, very accident-prone, and from time-to-time always think they can land something when ACTUALLY!, it will just explode.

XD XD XD XD XD XD XD XD XD XD

:sticktongue::sticktongue:
I always found them very similar to the Goblins of World of Warcraft, minus the money hungriness.

They're Michael Bay's caricature of humanity. A day in the life of a Kerbal is like fifty years of human history with only the most interesting parts left in (epic scientific achievements, and explosions).
The remind me of house-elves (Harry Potter) because they're so keen and small
